card_name: Lex, Axe Knight of Nörr's Blood
rules_text:
Trample, haste
[i]Great Knight Paragon [/i]– If a source you control would deal noncombat damage less than Lex's power, it deals damage equal to his power instead.
[i]Blood of the Axe Knight[/i] – Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, Lex gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
